token不能为空: トークンは空であってはならない
token不存在: トークンが存在しない
用户状态不正确: ユーザーステータスが正しくない
请求地址不存在: リクエストアドレスが存在しない
绑定成功: にバインドされました
两次密码不一致: パスワードが一致しない
手机号必填: 携帯電話番号は必須です
发送成功: 正常に送信されました
邮箱必填: メールアドレスは必須です
账号和密码不能为空: アカウントとパスワードを空にすることはできません
帐号或密码不正确: アカウントまたはパスワードが間違っています
手机号不存在: 電話番号は存在しません
邮箱不存在: メールが存在しません
交易时间为: トランザクションの時間
不能卖自己的卖单: 自分の注文を販売できません
图片格式不正确: 画像フォーマットが間違っている
您已成功下单，请及时付款。: ご注文が完了しましたので、期日までにお支払いください.
您已标记付款完成，请等待卖家确认。: マーク決済完了、販売者の確認をお待ちください
卖家已标记放款完成，请及时查收,如果有问题请联系卖家。: 売り手は、完了した資金のリリースをマークしている、時間内にあなたの領収書を確認してください、問題がある場合は、売り手に連絡してください.
订单生成成功，请等待买家付款。: 注文が正常に生成されましたので、購入者のお支払いをお待ちください.
买家已标记付款完成，请及时确认收款。: 購入者が支払い完了の印をつけたので、期限内に受け取りを確認してください.
该订单已标记完成，请及时放款给买家。: 注文は完了と表示されました、時間内にバイヤーにお金を解放してください.
该订单已被取消。: 注文はキャンセルされました.
手机号已注册: 携帯電話番号が登録されている
邮箱已注册: メールが登録されている
邀请码无效: 招待コードが無効です

lockup.nav_title: ロックアップマイニング
lockup.title: 採掘して収益を得る
lockup.desc: ロックアップマイニングは、USDTをプラットフォームのスーパーコンピュータマイニングマシンにステーキングし、プラットフォームのマイニングプールでマイニング報酬を得るプロセスです。

highlights.title: 商品の特徴

items.title: フレキシブルな引き出し

desc: 祝日でも利益が途切れない
入金成功後すぐに利息が開始される

example.title: 例を挙げる
example.income_desc:
メンバーはプラットフォームで10,000Uをロックし、サイクルは5日であり、ロック量のある日産の0.3%ウェルスマネジメント製品は次のように生産されます：
10000ux0.3% = 30u
つまり、5日間は得ることができますその後。ロックアッププリンシパルの有効期限が切れた後、150Uの収益は、資産口座に自動的に転送されました。
example.breach_desc:
元本が満期に達する前に元本を引き出したい場合、違約金が課せられます。違約金 = 違約決済比率 * 残りの日数 * ロックした金額です。
例：このロックアップマイニングの違約決済比率は0.4％で、満期まで残り3日でロックした金額が1000 USDTの場合、違約金は0.4％ * 3 * 1000 = 12 USDTとなります。違約金は元本から直接差し引かれます。

top.title: UDSTの取得
top.income: 最近のデイリー利回り

purchase.placeholder: 投資額を入力してください

tips.title: 採掘して収益を得る
tips.desc: ロックアップマイニングは、USDTをプラットフォームのスーパーコンピュータマイニングマシンにステーキングし、プラットフォームのマイニングプールでマイニング報酬を得るプロセスです。

subscribe.title: 委託注文
tips: 満期前に引き換える場合、違約金が発生します。違約金は元本から直接差し引かれます。違約金は約
USDTです。引き換えを確定しますか？

请选择货币: 通貨を選択してください
请选择银行卡类型: 銀行カードの種類を選択してください
交易金额: トランザクションの量
請在规定时间內完成交易，如果超時完成造成的損失自行: タイムアウトによって引き起こされた損失が自分で耐えることである場合、規定の時間内に取引を完了してください
您的C2C交易由系統自動匹配商家，法幣兌換數字貨幣: C2Cトランザクションは、システムによって商人を自動的に一致させ、Fiat Currency Exchange Digital Currencyは、国際的な実在の時間為替レートに従って取引されます。商人に一致した後、情報に情報と情報をマークするというトピックに必要な情報に注意してください
您的C2C交易由系统自动匹配商家，由于国际银行汇款: C2Cトランザクションは、国際銀行の送金が遅れているため、自動的に商人と一致します。あなたの銀行カード情報を正しく
请先选择货币，点击确定表明您已: 最初に通貨を選択してください。[OK]をクリックして合意したことを示して、上記の迅速な情報を読んでください。
正在匹配C2C商家，请您耐心等: C2Cマーチャントと一致しています。1〜5分間辛抱強く待ってください
您还有支付订单未完成,去完成: あなたはまだ支払い注文を持っていますが、支払いは完了していません、完了します
请在备注信息内填写收款银行的必: 備考情報とラベル付け情報のトピックで、受信銀行の必要な情報を入力してください
请按照下方提示的银行卡信息进行: 以下に促される銀行カード情報に従ってスクリーンショットを転送してアップロードしてください
请输入姓名: 名前を入力してください
转账交易图片: 取引写真を転送します
取消订单: 注文をキャンセルする
是否确认取消订单: キャンセル順序を確認するかどうか
没有更多数据了: これ以上のデータはありません
请在备注信息内输入您收款银行的: 領収書銀行の必要な情報を注目情報に入力し、情報の情報をマークしてください
请绑定手机号码: 携帯電話番号をバインドしてください
请绑定邮箱: メールボックスをバインドしてください
完成实名认证: Fund Managementに便利なReal -Name認証を完了します
定期修改密码利于账户安全: アカウントのセキュリティのために、パスワードを定期的に変更します
最小提币数量：50.00USDT，小于最小金额的提币将不会到账且无法退回: 最小出金額: 50.00USDT, 最小金額未満の出金は入金されず、返金できません

message: CoinExへようこそ。ご質問がある場合は、オンラインカスタマーサービスにお問い合わせください。ずっとご支援いただきありがとうございます！〜
比特幣(Bit): ビットコイン（Bitcoin、略してBTC）は最初のデジタル資産種であり、2009年に開発者である「中本聰」の化名でオープンソースソフトウェアとして公開されました。Bitcoinは、ピアツーピアのネットワーク支払いシステムおよび仮想会計ツールであり、総供給量は2100万です。通貨の生産と転送を制御するために暗号技術を採用しているため、Bitcoinは電子暗号通貨の一種と見なされています。

Your use is governed by the agreement between you (hereinafter referred to as you or your) and the exchange operator (defined below). By accessing, downloading, using, or clicking I agree to accept any Exchange services (defined below) provided by the Exchange (defined below), you agree that you have read, understood, and accepted all the terms and conditions set forth in this agreement, these terms (hereinafter referred to as these terms), and our privacy policy located here. Additionally, when using certain features of the service, you may be required to comply with specific additional terms and conditions applicable to these features.

By accessing, using, or attempting to use CoinEx services in any capacity, you acknowledge that you accept and agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please do not access CoinEx or use CoinEx services.

Please carefully read these terms as they apply to your use of CoinEx services. These terms contain important provisions, including a mandatory arbitration provision requiring all claims to be resolved through binding arbitration. The terms of the arbitration provision are set forth in Section 10, Resolution of Disputes: Forum, Arbitration, Class Action Waiver, below. Like any asset, the value of digital currency (defined below) may experience significant fluctuations, and there is a substantial risk of economic loss when buying, selling, holding, or investing in digital currency and its derivatives. By using CoinEx services, you acknowledge and agree: (1) you understand the risks associated with trading digital currency and its derivatives; (2) you assume all risks associated with using CoinEx services and trading digital currency and its derivatives; (3) CoinEx is not responsible for any such risks or adverse outcomes.

CoinEx Platform Rules refer to all rules, interpretations, announcements, statements, agreements, etc., published by CoinEx and subsequently published, as well as those in the help center or product or service processes.

2. Users refer to individuals, organizations, or entities that access, download, or use CoinEx or CoinEx services and comply with the conditions and terms specified by CoinEx. If there are separate agreements from developers, issuers, market makers, digital currency exchanges, etc., those agreements take precedence.

3. Digital assets refer to digital currency, its derivatives, or other digitized assets with certain value.

4. CoinEx account refers to the basic virtual account opened by CoinEx for users on CoinEx to record their use of CoinEx services, transactions, asset changes, and basic information, including main accounts and sub-accounts. The CoinEx account is the basis for users to enjoy and exercise rights on CoinEx.

5. Prohibited Use By accessing and using CoinEx services, you declare and warrant that you are not listed on any trade embargo or economic sanctions list (such as the United Nations Security Council sanctions list), the Special Designated Nationals list maintained by OFAC (Office of Foreign Assets Control of the U.S. Department of the Treasury), or the denied persons or entities list of the U.S. Department of Commerce. CoinEx reserves the right to choose the markets and jurisdictions in which to conduct business and may, at its discretion, restrict or refuse to provide CoinEx services in certain countries or regions.

6. Account Usage Requirements CoinEx accounts can only be used by the account registrant. CoinEx reserves the right to suspend, freeze, or cancel the usage of CoinEx accounts by individuals other than the account registrant. If you suspect or discover any unauthorized use of your username and password, you should immediately notify CoinEx. CoinEx is not liable for any loss or damage caused by you or any third party using CoinEx accounts, with or without your authorization.

Colorado, USA, October 13, 2022 /EINPresswire.com/ - With the rise of the new digital currency financial market, the global investment platform USACoinExFund has emerged, keeping pace with the times and creating a global user base for the USACoinExFund international investment ecosystem. In the midst of the pandemic, it has brought new choices to global financial investment users.

The USACoinExFund platform has professional investment professionals who can strategically allocate your assets for investment, maximizing the value of your returns. Through services such as contract trading and financial mining, you can achieve maximum asset returns in a short period, realizing a life of financial freedom.

The USACoinExFund platform is a digital currency system based on blockchain technology. Committed to building a world-class investment platform, it aims to become the world's largest and most active innovative platform for digital currency games, giving every investor an equal opportunity to gain wealth and breaking the concentration of wealth in the hands of a few.

At the same time, the USACoinExFund platform supports decentralized, association-based governance capabilities at the technical level. Through the creation of contract agreements and the comprehensive application of cryptography and blockchain technology, it achieves trustworthy and efficient custody and clearing of Token assets, thus addressing the core issues faced by Token assets in traditional investment platforms and projects. This innovative asset custody and clearing technology will bring disruptive innovation to the cryptocurrency market, providing users with security and crowdfunding returns stronger than bank-level security.

As for the team, the core team of the US CoinEx Fund platform brings together top talents in the industry, including senior technical engineers, global blockchain research experts, international operation teams, and world-class risk control experts. The platform adopts leading global encryption technology and independently developed clustered memory aggregation systems, bringing together a variety of financial services and supporting multiple languages. It is committed to providing global users with a more secure, stable, and convenient digital asset investment and trading experience. Translation retains

Privacy Statement - CoinEx
CoinEx collects and processes what personal information? Why does CoinEx process my personal information? What is the legal basis for using personal information?

CoinEx collects and processes what personal information?
- Email address;
- Name;
- Gender;
- Date of birth;
- Home address;
- Phone number;
- Nationality;
- Device ID;
- Your video recordings;
- Transaction information;

Why does CoinEx process my personal information?
- Transaction services. We use your personal information to process your orders and communicate with you about orders and services;
- Communication with you. We use your personal information to communicate with you about CoinEx services;
We collect and process identity information and sensitive personal data (as detailed in Section 1) to comply with applicable legal regulations and the Customer Due Diligence (KYC) obligations stipulated by anti-money laundering laws and regulations;

What is the legal basis for using personal information (EU and UK GDPR)?
When we provide products or services to you or communicate with you about these products or services, it is to fulfill a contract. This includes when we use your personal information to accept and process orders and process payments;
- Internet Protocol (IP) address used to connect your computer to the internet;
- Login name, email address, password, and location of your device or computer;
- CoinEx service indicators (such as the occurrence of technical errors, your interaction with service features and content, and your settings preferences);
- Version and time zone settings;
- Used for providing CoinEx services, troubleshooting, and improving CoinEx services. We use your personal information to provide features, analyze performance, fix errors, and enhance the availability and effectiveness of CoinEx services;
- Transaction history;
- Information from other sources: We may receive information about you from other sources, such as credit records from credit bureaus; fraud prevention and credit risk. We process personal information to prevent and detect fraud and abuse, thereby protecting our users, CoinEx services, and others' safety. We may also use scoring methods to assess and manage credit risk;
- Information about your behavior: We may process information about your behavior and activities for marketing and advertising purposes;
- Improve our services. We process personal information to improve our services and provide you with a better user experience;
- Recommendations and personalization. We use your personal information to recommend features and services that may interest you, identify your preferences, and personalize your experience with CoinEx services; our legitimate interests in improving our services; when you provide your consent for processing your personal information for specific purposes, the information conveyed to you for those purposes when you consent. When you consent to the processing of your personal information for specific purposes, you can withdraw your consent at any time, and we will stop processing your data for that purpose.
